tool_description: TLDR (Too Long Didn't Read) is a Text Analysis API that allows you to extract summaries and ranked keywords from articles on web.
name: TLDR Text Analysis
title: TLDR Text Analysis

api_list.name: Summarize
api_list.description: Summarizes an article by fetching text from a specified URL or reading the input text and generating a summary for a web article.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: This field contains the text input for the text summarization request. It can be either a URL or the raw text of an article.

api_list.name: Sentiment Analysis
api_list.description: Performs sentiment analysis on a web article or text input.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: This field contains the text input for the sentiment analysis request. It can be either a URL or the raw text of an article.

api_list.name: Extract Keywords
api_list.description: Extracts keywords from an article given the URL for the article and the number of keywords to search for.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: This field contains the text input for the keyword extraction request. It can be either a URL or the raw text of an article.
